class.name: Waveform
class.description: A singleton utility for generating min/max pairs for drawing audio waveforms.

method.name: generate
method.description: Generates min/max waveform pairs for the given AudioStream at the specified sampling frequency (e.g. 60 Hz). Only AudioStream types that can be instantiated into playback (e.g. AudioStreamOggVorbis) are supported. The returned array contains Vector2(min, max) for each time window.
